CustomField.description: Quarter in which the first investment made
CustomField.formula: IF(ISBLANK( Account.PFG_Date_of_first_Commitment__c ), "", TEXT(YEAR( Account.PFG_Date_of_first_Commitment__c)) + " Q" + TEXT(CEILING( MONTH ( Account.PFG_Date_of_first_Commitment__c) / 3 )))
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Formula filed pulling the quarter from Account
CustomField.label: PFG First Investment - Quarter
